trends: There have been 74 other sightings in St Louis
There was one other sighting in St Louis on or around August 10th 2008
divs: Sighting Details I was riding my bike in St. Marcus Park and I saw a black cigar shaped object rise vertically in the distance. I stopped and watched it and it stopped directly above me. When it stopped above me I noticed it was shiny and metallic. I watched it from about 1:30 till about 2:30 when it got so far I couldn't see it anymore. It just kept floating around and periodicaly stopping.
